>
[Kobold Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=1273) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You attentively learned key kobold survival strategies and mythology from your elders. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) and [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Kobold Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
